article_title: Reducing veteran suicides, one step at a time

article_metadata.description: WASHINGTON — Clay Hunt was a Marine veteran, a soldier who served in Iraq and Afghanistan, who volunteered in earthquake-ravaged Haiti and Chile and went on long-distance bike rides to keep his war-induced depression at bay.

og.description: Minnesota Rep. Tim Walz is close to pushing a “first-step” veterans’ mental health bill through Congress, but everyone acknowledges more needs to be done.
og.title: Reducing veteran suicides, one step at a time
